Wired works though, but that is not why I got this cam in the first place.Camera will go back to big red C, may be for replacement, but based on all neg comments - most likely for return. I'm sick and tired of all this Chinese junk. Big red C dropped the ball on this one.

Reviews.Title: This is a toy -- not ready for use
Reviews.Author: Marcus
Reviews.Content: I bought this for monitoring our investment rental property in Europe.  It was easy enough to set up: my father and brother-in-law installed it together and linked it to the Yoics service.  It's outside under large overhanging eves, but protected from all weather by a glass shroud.  Technically it works fine, but usage is terribly clunky.  The pan/tilt feature is what I bought it for, and this is the worst.  There are no user definable presets, and clicking to the right or left only moves a few degrees.  With internet and camera lag time, it takes more than a few minutes to move from left to right and vice versa.  VERY SLOW WITH EXTREME LAG ON PAN/TILT.  I use a Mac, but tried also w/ IE.  No difference.  My old Panasonic camera that had died after several years had many user presets.  Also, the Yoics advertisements to upgrade drive you crazy every time you log in to look at the webcam.  Just logging into the Yoics website to look at the webcam is an ordeal.  Wish I could take it back but it's now in Europe.  I'll be buying something else.

Reviews.Title: WHAT A JOKE, WHICH COSTCO BUYER ACTUALLY VETTED THIS PRODUCT???
Reviews.Author: Bostonia
Reviews.Content: This product is not ready for market. It does NOT self configure. I am microsoft certified on windows 2003 server and also CISCO certified, and I could not get this thing running. After 53 minutes on their live chat support, they finally got it to be recognized, but the video feature did not work. I returned it and got another one, hoping it was a fluke. I tried it at my friends house,same process, except it got video intermittently at his house....yippy!I am very dissapointed,mostly with Costco for allowing such an amateurish product to be sold in their stores.

Reviews.Title: Buyer be Ware
Reviews.Author: SK
Reviews.Content: The "Mole" by Astak is very misleading. First, it is not simple to install, (it has a known quirk for not recognizing certian alpha/numeric characters in your wireless router account) second the camera has bright red led lights on it which make it nearly impossible to hide from anyone who enters the room (like a burglar). And finally and perhaps most important there is zero support from the company who makes it,- Astak, Inc. The have a phone number which in not manned by a live person at anytime, and no one from the company has ever returned my calls or emails for tech support or general questions. Astak's phone message system sounds a bit like a child's toy, which makes me question the validity of the company all together. It appears that viewing your camera image on the web will be an added charge, information that you are only given once you purchase and install the camera. I am returning my unit, I would rather spend more on a unit from a reputable company.

Reviews.Title: Not Ready For Prime Time
Reviews.Author: Jintili
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera at Costco. The packaging and product appeared well done, however the engineering and software are, in my opinion, extremely non-intuitive and amateurish. The claim on the package that the device features " EZ setup, no configuration required" was definitely NOT the case in my experience. The camera appeared to use a weird combination of Astak's interface and something called "YOICS" interface and the combination of going back and forth was confusing at best and with no explanation of why, or if, using both interfaces is necessary or even advisable. Neither Astak's nor "YOICS" software was capable of finding my WiFi network despites several hours of tweeking the router and the camera settings. A call to the so-called "support" number was answered by a man with a thick accent that was extremely difficult to understand and who claimed to be located in California. I got the distinct impression that this individual was handling tech support calls from home. He sounded unprofessional and as if he had been sleeping. He was totally unable to analyze or solve my problem in any meaningful way. When the few lame suggestions he made (e.g. "Try moving the camera two feet away from the router"), predictably, didn't work, he simply became silent. There was no step-by-step analytical problem-solving that one usually associates with a well-run professional tech company. My impression is that Astak is a start-up company with a skeleton tech support system and that the product itself is very buggy and unreliable. This company's version of this product is definitely not ready for prime time, in my opinion. I'm packing it up as I type this and it's heading back to Costco for a full refund as well as a bill to Costco for wasting my valuable time.

Reviews.Title: didn't work
Reviews.Author: Dylan Wood
Reviews.Content: Its simple - I bought this from costco, brought it home - setup seemed easy - I skipped the yoics connection and went direct to an ip.  I saw an image... wait a minute - the camera is resetting itself.  It would only work for about 3 or 4 minutes - then reset itself and never come back on.So I spoke to maya over at tech support - she said return it.  I did.Got a new one - came home - it was working for a whole hour... then the same thing started to happen.  Brought it back - I'm done with this POS.  It feels like a cheap POS too.

Reviews.Title: Useless when Astak's server is down.....
Reviews.Author: rwpritchett "rpritchett"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera so I could monitor my business when I'm away from the office. The description of the camera and some of the online reviews were great. But I can't even get it installed, because Astak's servers are down. The person answering the "help line" has a thick accent and is extremely hard to understand. But from what I can gather, they do not have a backup server to allow their camera users to access their cameras remotely when Astak's main server is down, which it has been all day today. That kind of defeats one of the main purposes of having the camera. I'll be returning the camera in the morning and finding one from a more reliable company.

Reviews.Title: If you have a Mac, buy something else
Reviews.Author: Roger A. Brooks
Reviews.Content: The Astrak Mole camera was easy to set up, but it's barely Macintosh compatible. To access the camera, you use a browser, but if you use a browser other than Internet Explorer, many of the features end up missing and the few that do work are painfully slow. It's really geared only to Windows machines.Additionally, if you want to access video files recorded on the SD card (you need to buy this separately), you have to manually download each file, then use third party software to actually open and view the files. This goes back to the days of DOS computing. There is no way to delete video files from the SD card. When it fills up it will simply overwrite the older files.The power brick has a cord that's only about 6' long, so think about that when you install it. That short of a cord really makes placement a pain in the rear and chances are you'll be running extension cords to it.It does not have a zoom feature.When motion is detected, it will send you an e-mail with a snapshot, which is a nice feature. Then it will continue sending you e-mails every few seconds until the motion stops. Unfortunately, there is no way to adjust this.It would be nice if you could tell it how frequently, or infrequently, you wish to receive alerts.On the good side, the wi-fi enable camera works well, the quality is good, and it does have sound, which many of these types of cameras don't. It was relatively easy to set up and the night vision is good.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: S. Kucklinca "Moxie Madness"
Reviews.Content: The Astak camera is a nifty little gadget that enables the user to monitor office or home safety and capture creative videos that can be posted to Twitter, Facebook, MySpace etc. The movements of the camera are a little noisy (thus not a 5 star review) but sharing with friends and using the camera right out of the box are as simple as plug n play. The price may be more than other off the shelf webcams but you have more control remotely to permit a touch more creativity by "hiding" the camera and being part of the action! The YOICS features to control the camera are easy to use and get your friends and family involved and they do not need the camera to help monitor - That's Great!

Reviews.Title: Mole IP Cam
Reviews.Author: Andy
Reviews.Content: It's one of the best camera I have worked with (among at least 3 others I have tried)The quality is great, and the connection is usually very good over wifi, 3G is a bit slow.I would recommend if anyone is looking for a security, nanny, pet came, this is the one to go with.

Reviews.Title: Mole camera meets all my home security needs
Reviews.Author: Payal
Reviews.Content: I purchased mole camera esp. when I was to get a nanny for my little baby. I wanted to have peace of mind and be able to have a look at how the nanny was caring for the baby while I was at work. I could access the camera link from anywhere. I could easily adjust the view coverage and rotate for a 360 degree view. It was so easy to setup the camera, there were no dufficult steps involved in the installation. Infact it is portable enough to be carried around the house, plus once linked to the wireless it provides uninterupted coverage. I am very satisfied with the picture quality for its clarity. I will highly recommend this product. This is much economic than getting any other professional home security services.

Reviews.Title: Best portable network camera
Reviews.Author: Don
Reviews.Content: I have the ASTAK MOLE WiFi H.264 at my cabin in the mountains.  I use to rely on the neighbors to check on the cabin after a storm, or when my cabin/house alarm would suddenly go off when I am hundreds of miles away.Now, I quickly log in, turn up the sound and check out the inside of my cabin to see in the dark or light of day!I can also turn the camera to view outside the cabin window to check the weather for sunshine or the amount of snow I will be driving into!I am going to buy more for the areas of the cabin and the other home.

Reviews.Title: impossible to setup with certain routers
Reviews.Author: Scott S. "cameraman"
Reviews.Content: Impossible to setup with my very common cable modem/wireless router configuration. I've got a cable modem with single ethernet jack. That ethernet is hooked into my airport express wireless router, which also has only a single ethernet jack. So, to setup this camera, you need to plug an ethernet cable directly into the router. Well, can't do that with my setup and have internet functionality on the network at the same time.I put an ethernet switch hub so that I could hook in multiple devices. Still doesn't work. Did livechat with helpline, they said it won't work, has to hook directly into router, and told me to return it. I feel like it should be very possible, but I don't know enough about networks to proceed.First, I think the setup, for a wireless device, should be possible without having to connect to the internet. I want to use this darn thing at home, on my home network. Second, it would be nice to know the exact requirements before purchasing this doorstop. Third, rude customer service on the live chatline.I'd wait for something easier to use and less expensive.

Reviews.Title: Poor Software, Poor Construction, No Wireless = Return
Reviews.Author: C. Denslow
Reviews.Content: Purchased this item from Costco because it was on sale this week.  The setup was so terrible, I decided to write a review here to warn people away from the product.  First off, the included software can't detect the camera.  No permutation of seeings could fix that issue.  Additionally, the wireless functionality does not work at all.  I went so far as to completely turn off the security on my router and the camera still would not detect any available wireless networks.  After screwing on the wireless antenna once, the mount on the back of the camera came loose as well.  Poor software, poor construction and non-existent wireless equals a trip back to Costco for a refund.  I expected better from a $200 camera.

Reviews.Title: Lousy Software
Reviews.Author: JB
Reviews.Content: I bought the Astak CM-Mole from Costco this evening ($169.99 btw) and tried to set it up.  Worked fine wired, but the wireless setup failed no matter what options I tried.  The web application used to set up the camera is extremely primitive so I used the Yoics (software/service provider) live chat and was fortunate to get a knowledgable support person.  No help though as the problem is that their software has restrictions on what characters can be used in your wireless router password!  Poor software combined with the fact that when you read the fine print you will realize that after the first year you have to pay for the Pro level of service to be able to view your camera online for more than 15 min/day, means I will be returning this product tomorrow.

Reviews.Title: Worked great 1st day, died 2nd day
Reviews.Author: C. Rees
Reviews.Content: I set it up and it works great the first day. I didn't use the software that it came with - I used dyndns instead and it was great. It did everything I wanted. On the second day, I unplugged it to move it to a different area and when I plugged it back in, it didn't ever get out of the initialization mode. It just tilted and paned over and over again. It also started making 3 clicks during the tilt and pan initialization.Would be great if it lasted more than 1 day.

Reviews.Title: Has NOT worked as promised, but good customer service
Reviews.Author: Ed from Austin "Ed"
Reviews.Content: We wanted to use this to see our pets when we were on vacation.  Unfortunately, we could never get the wi fi to work.  Customer service was great, but even they couldn't get it to work.  They told me to get a new one.  Didn't have time, so ended up buying a 25 foot cable.Secondly, after 8 million tries - still can't get the email notification to work.  Again, great customer service, but no luck getting this function to work.So basically all I get is a screen shot of my living room.Will be returning this.

Reviews.Title: Disaster
Reviews.Author: ps902
Reviews.Content: Although the camera appears to be quite good, the instructions, software and help line must be the most worthless I have ever encountered.  I am not a techie, but do understand how to set things up etc., but the Chinglish manual and incomprehensible help emails reached a new level of incomprehensibilty.  Regrettably, it appears that it has advanced functionality, but making it work is another matter.  Cisco here I come.

Reviews.Title: terrible product, do not buy
Reviews.Author: Jay Why "Lookin' for the Answer"
Reviews.Content: It worked for a week and thereafter...did not work.  The software is a bear and clunky, and does not work very well.  Do not buy this product if you want something competent and reduced grief.

Reviews.Title: Terrible product
Reviews.Author: Sharon K. Sutton "Intellectual property champion"
Reviews.Content: Came without CD in the box - software on CD not available on website.Video quality poor - grainy, bad color, slow response to movement (on my gigabit LAN!)Camera will not hold settings - I set it to 2048 kB and it reverts to 384 kB every time.I also have a Foscam, same specs and far superior.

Reviews.Title: Worked great for 1 1/2 yrs
Reviews.Author: Nradv
Reviews.Content: Worked great for 1 1/2 yrs. on web, saved to sd card, view on iPhone etc. Saving to Youtube no longer supported for at least a year. But NOW, the company has bailed on its consumers after selling tons thru Costco etc. (where they no longer sell). There is absolutely NO MORE tech support. NO Chats. NO email replies. NO phone. Used to be occasionally they'd get back to you. And the existing support info online is weak and outdated. My Camera does not save to sd card--and can't get help/info from Astak. I'd avoid buying, even at discount prices.If they ever get back to me i'll update this comment.

Reviews.Title: Works as it is meant to..
Reviews.Author: TechnoGirl
Reviews.Content: Works!.. easy to install.. easy to use.. set it to send pictures every 5 / 6 hours.. it works like a charm.I had a bit of hard time to install the second one, more likely didn't know at the time.. if you buy two or more, install them as "individuals, so they can all send pictures simultaneously.couple of things - not usable outdoors due to its electric cord dependency.. it would be better if they were battery operated, so you can install it anywhere away from the power outlets.The other - i thought they can be better priced.

Reviews.Title: Third party hosting is a joke.
Reviews.Author: ric03014
Reviews.Content: There are several problems with this camera. First, while the camera has a built in mic, you can only hear audio on a few select devices. Audio is not support on Apple products. Image comes through on an iPad, but no sound. If your device does not have an Internet Explorer browser, no sound for you. Since we purchased this to use primarily as a baby monitor, that would have been nice to know.Second, to view the device remotely you must use a third party. In this case set up automatically uses yoics.net. Terrible choice. Yoics floods you with ads and multiple hoops to jump through every time you try to view the camera remotely. You can pay them money and they claim they will take down the ads. We did not know that prior to purchase. I would not have purchased had we known about Yoics and their ridiculous service.Third (and related to Second), Yoics quickly times-out the viewing display and requires you to log back in after several minutes. Navigating through their multiple ads is bad enough, but then Yoics limits the number of times you can log in to view the camera. If you are viewing from the same network the camera is on this is not a big deal (but see Fourth, below) because you can bypass Yoics and enter the IP address in the web browser to view the camera.Fourth, even when viewing the camera on a local IP address and by passing Yoics, the camera frequently freezes and you must refresh the browser.The camera quality itself seems ok. However, night mode is on most of the time unless the room is very bright. Otherwise, most viewing is in might vision mode (low quality black and white image). It all comes down to operation that makes this product problematic.

Reviews.Title: Better than paying for a monthly fee
Reviews.Author: michael de sousa
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera. I have mine setup to monitor parts of my house during certain hours of the day. You can adjust the sensitivity and have it email you with a picture when it does go off. the only difference between this camera and a professional system is you have to do the monitoring yourself. If there is a real break in you have to be the one that has to alert authorities.I love this camera, the app works well also

Reviews.Title: not support with my synology NAS surveillance system
Reviews.Author: Rob
Reviews.Content: try to link the ip cam to my NAS from video saving on server.but this ip cam is not on the supported list .please help me with the setting thx.nas: synology DS-713+

Reviews.Title: Caution with this product....
Reviews.Author: nicman1
Reviews.Content: I have had My MOLE camera by Astak operating fine for over a year when it suddenly went ' inactive '.  I have spent days attempting to re activate the device without success. There is no response from ASTAK when you attempt to contact them through their HELP desk.So far YOIC's has not been too helpful either.I have not been able to determine if ASTAK has gone out of business or what the problem is.

Reviews.Title: Astak Pan/Tilt Night Vision IP Network Camera (Black)
Reviews.Author: 467fhp
Reviews.Content: I just got this camera yesterday. Since I already have two Moles and had no problems setting them up I have tried all day to get this one going but so far no luck. And since it is a holiday I can not get tech support . I will try another day or two before I return it.Update: When Amazon and the vendor Cascade Associates learned of my problem they both came to my aid. They both tried to help and I think they were really concerned. The vendor bent over backwards trying to help and offered to refund my money. The problem was really with Astak , the maker of the Mole camera. I finally was able talk to one of their tech guys who after making sure I was the legal owner, they  transferred the camera to me from a previous owner since it was a camera sold as used but in new condition.Thanks Amazon , this is one reason I love doing business with you. And to Cascade Associates thanks again and I would do business with you again.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: VJS
Reviews.Content: Very poor as a matter of fact it support was so poor I may just as well have send there was  non-at all. My final decision was to return the item.

Reviews.Title: Tilt Great - No Flash Cards Sent
Reviews.Author: David R. Guthery
Reviews.Content: The Pan Tilt was great, having hard time setting up the email.  I NEVER GOT THE FLASH CARDS????? Judge D.R.G.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Margaret Silvestri
Reviews.Content: I use this camera to check on my dog when I am at work.  I love the remote features, being able to move the camera to find him.

Reviews.Title: Didn't work
Reviews.Author: W. Johnson
Reviews.Content: I've used a few other IP cameras in the past, and they've all set up just fine.  This one, on the other hand, didn't.I didn't bother contacting customer service because why should I?It needs to work out of the box without a 3 hour phone call, thanks.I do not suggest this product.

Reviews.Title: Damaged
Reviews.Author: Steven A. Souza
Reviews.Content: Directions for setup followed to the letter. After set up, camera picture view was discolored, distorted, blurry and night vision did not work at all. Product returned following day.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy used
Reviews.Author: Drew Miller
Reviews.Content: Bought 4 of these cameras used and when I went to set them up they were already registered and would not let me set them up.  Now I have to return all of the cameras as when I called Astak they would not switch the registration to me.  What a waste of time and very frustrated.

Reviews.Title: Super Easy and so Reliable
Reviews.Author: S. Turosak
Reviews.Content: Got this to monitor our foster dogs who have varying levels of separation anxiety. Now I have no anxiety leaving them alone. I can even talk to them, if I need to by just adding speakers. The motion detector with alert emails is also a good security feature.

Reviews.Title: Total Piece of Crap
Reviews.Author: David R. Burrows "drb"
Reviews.Content: If you can figure this out, good luck.  Horrible links and info.  I'm too old for this anymore.  It is now in tech heaven......I feel better now.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Maggie Lascano
Reviews.Content: Best Wireless IP camera for under $200.Really easy to set up, easy to control from computer.  Apple products have a few hiccups loading the image and controlling the camera.  Overall a great buy

Reviews.Title: Spy eye
Reviews.Author: John Barber
Reviews.Content: Because of good wrap pack.I have one network camera at home so I need other one and found good price.I keep to look for it and found it thru Amazon.com. I grasp it so quickly with good price.

Reviews.Title: Geek Corner Astak Mole Wifi H.264 Easy Setup Indoor Ip Network Camera...
Reviews.Author: Mastercard
Reviews.Content: The camera works great as it was described on the website. The setup was not so bad, the Disk that came with the camera was defective, so I was not able to install the desktop version of the camera which allows you to set it up, I did try to download the software from the manufacture web site, but every time you click on the link they provided for download you get error message saying the page cannot be found, so I have register the camera and I did used the web interface to configure the camera. It works fine, from time to time it make some strange notice, I have not been able to figure out what makes the camera to produce this kind of noise I have noticed it few times so far I have it for less than a week. The camera can be accessed from any wed browser as long as you have static IP. It is practical for monitoring baby or your dogs or take a look at your home when you away from home.

Reviews.Title: Good camera - poor internet control service UPDATE
Reviews.Author: D. Trost "Music Man"
Reviews.Content: My wife and I travel a lot, and bought this camera to look over our cat when we're away.  Mechanically, the camera seems to work great, but you have this internet control via a company called YOICS.COM.  We find it frequently hard to log in, the controls are very sluggish (if they work).  Also, you are constantly bombarded by offers to "upgrade your service".  YOICS.COM seems to do other business (e.g. iCLOUD,etc.) and we are absolutely not interested in that.  If we knew in advance the service would be so poor, that might have influenced our decision to buy this camera.UPDATE:  May 2013.  We paid the $25 yearly fee to upgrade our service and the difference in camera response is huge.  I recommend this upgrade.  That said, they should have said something up front.

Reviews.Title: Astak Mole is Awesome
Reviews.Author: Scott C.
Reviews.Content: Wow! Astak Mole is Awesome. Easy setup. Watching via iPhone in no time at all. Just what we hoped for.

Reviews.Title: #2 IP camera
Reviews.Author: Susan Lamb
Reviews.Content: The first camera works very good, I hope this one is as good.I looked at the MOLE web site and did not see this camera as an item to buy, I hope MOLE is going to cont. to support it.

Reviews.Title: Mole Wireless Network Camera
Reviews.Author: Madalena
Reviews.Content: I purchased a camera like this one about 1 year ago and I love it. I would love it even more if I could also use it as an outdoor camera. Overall, this camera is an excellent purchase.

Reviews.Title: Astak IP cam
Reviews.Author: Dara Ea
Reviews.Content: I love cameras. This is a great up cam for home use. The setup is easy for those who know computer and its network. The videos a d snapshots are pretty good you can pan and tilt. I have a small complaint. They should have put an option to limit the field to view. Right now the camera would go 360 degree no matter what.Oh! The server is very good. You can watch it from any thing that you can connect to the internet including your smart phone.

Reviews.Title: camera works great
Reviews.Author: SB
Reviews.Content: This camera is a good camera for watching my house on the internet. It has good sound, night vision, and pan/tilt features.I connect to it from my iphone and laptop.

Reviews.Title: Saved from feeze up
Reviews.Author: cassidykb
Reviews.Content: Mole paid for itself and more the first month I had it.  Bought the unit because of it's motion detection feature because I work away form home for extended periods.  Put thermometer with in view of the camera so I could monitor the temperation in the house when I'm away.  The first time I checked it the temperature was at 40F and falling.  Outdoor temp was -4F.  I immediately called a friend to go to check on the house.  There had been power surbge that tripped the boiler.  This was easily reset and everything was fine.  If not for the MAstak Pan/Tilt Night Vision IP Network Camera (Black)ole the house would have frozen solid, pipes burst etc. costing thousands.

Reviews.Title: Mole
Reviews.Author: micmil630
Reviews.Content: This has been one of the best investments I have made.  I mainly use it for security purposes.  The video and audio are great.

Reviews.Title: Good surveillance camera
Reviews.Author: vishal pall
Reviews.Content: Excellent surveillance camera. Used itf for our nanny cam...so relieved at wor with the remote monitoring. Reliable. Use it from our iPhones.

Reviews.Title: Great for the not so technical
Reviews.Author: eyemalive
Reviews.Content: The Astak MOLE Camera is great for those who have trouble setting up highly technical equipment.  We setup the MOLE using the included software and were up in running in about 10 minutes.  Search for an APP called "Live Cam" if you are an iOS user and you will be able to use their great software to view as many cameras as you need to at once (think video surveillance).There are likely a few better performing camera's out there, but with the simplicity of installation and setup, I would suggest the MOLE to just about anyone looking for a way to remotely view a rooom or house.

Reviews.Title: Good investment
Reviews.Author: Aravinda
Reviews.Content: Had the device for about an year now and am very satisfied with the product, the motion detection comes in very handy when receiving snapshots to ur email.

Reviews.Title: Astak Mole Camera
Reviews.Author: tracief
Reviews.Content: I really like this product.  I bought it after my house was broken into.  I now can peek into my house at any time and see what is going on, even from my Droid.  I can also check in on my dogs, which is very comforting.  I am not very computer savvy but it was fairly easy to set up.  I want to learn how to set it to record after motion activation.  I am not sure this capability is available. It also blends in with decor easily so it's not very obvious.

Reviews.Title: Great item
Reviews.Author: cigarilo
Reviews.Content: Iv been using this system for over 2 years now it works great I love it I use it for home security and as a baby monitor I can't get it to send me emails but I'll work on it

Reviews.Title: Poor Customer Service
Reviews.Author: S. Singh
Reviews.Content: I had this product for a few months and it worked perfectly.  However, after a seasonal power outage, the unit would not reboot correctly and stream a wireless image. I contacted Astak live chat on 2 separate occasions and this isssue was not resolved.Furthermore, they accessed my Apple computer with a program called " GoToAssist Customer"that never disconnected from my computer.  Multiple attempts to uninstall the program have not worked. My guess is that I will need to contact Apple to remove this program.After ~ 4 hours of hands-on troubleshooting, my webcam still doesn't work.  This was definitely not worth my time and energy!

Reviews.Title: Mole camera is sweet!
Reviews.Author: My pen name
Reviews.Content: This is an easy way to wirelessly integrate video surveillance into any area that has access to wifi service.  The Mole was relatively easy to set up and I have used it to check in on my home using the Internet from the opposite side of the earth.  The audio connectivity works well when accessing the camera from a pc connection, but I wish i could find a way to work the audio connectivity with iOS (iPad).  Overall a great device.

Reviews.Title: Astak camera is AWESOME
Reviews.Author: Devo
Reviews.Content: The hardest part of the Astak is opening the package.Setup is simple and easy. I have found the pan/tilt through the web interface performs well for my application.The attention to monitor details is well received for my purposes.I truly like the ability to have images sent to my mobile device in a timely fashion.

Reviews.Title: Liked it so much bought 2
Reviews.Author: Lewis E. Hoskins
Reviews.Content: I purchased my first mole camera at Costco once I saw how easy it was to set up and use, I decided to purchased a second camera. I have both cameras for over a year and have had no problems. If you are looking for a excellent network camera , try this camera.Astak Pan/Tilt Night Vision IP Network Camera (Black)

Reviews.Title: Great for peace of mind
Reviews.Author: Stanley McCrea
Reviews.Content: I installed my Mole in my living room and I really like the ability to access it remotely and the fact that it can send pictures and video to a remote location.  For the price I paid I am very happy with this product.

Reviews.Title: Mole Camera
Reviews.Author: J Matthews
Reviews.Content: I own 2 Mole cameras, 1 bought new st Costco and 1 bought used from Ebay.  I have been nothing but pleased with both cameras.  I had bought 2 very similar cameras (all different brands) in the past from other dealers and 1 took a computer expert to get working, the other one never did work. The new Mole camera worked great right out of the box oncluding the wireless setup. I had to call tech support to get the used one up and ruuning due to the fact that the serial number for the camera had been registered to another owner.  The tech people showed me how to reset the camera and they reset the information on their end.  No problems with tech support and both cameras work beautifully.  I can leave the unplugged for months and go plug 1 back in and it immidiately hits our home router and starts working. I would recommend these cameras without reservation.  I will probably buy a 3rd camera in the future.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Nipahome
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera to keep an eye on my house and dog during the day.  It was easy to setup and use, and I am quite pleased with the product.

Reviews.Title: Mole Camera good value
Reviews.Author: jlgs
Reviews.Content: I have tried other wireless camera systems and I must say the Mole camera I purchased at Costco was definitely the best one so far.  It was easy to set up and is still in use after many months of service.

Reviews.Title: easy to use
Reviews.Author: taxidr001
Reviews.Content: Not having much experience with security cameras I needed lots and lots of help  setting up and using this device--customer service was great!! You will not be disappointed with the effectiveness or the easy of operation of this device

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: Great camera for the price if you need pan and tilt with night visionI'm going to be buying three more notifications and recording is a little difficult to setup... Other than that all around solid unit

Reviews.Title: Excellent do it all webcam!!
Reviews.Author: Gnurd
Reviews.Content: I've had this webcam for nearly a year, and love the product. The P/T functions work well, although the web UI is somewhat lacking in usability/interoperability. Yoics recently released newer IOS apps for the webcam, but they have crashing issues and do not always display the video when on 3g cell service. Still for the price, I don't think you can find a better webcam! Let's hope yoics will update their iOS app and web pages.I'd love to be able to embed this webcam into a webpage, but I haven't been able to figure it out.Thanks.

Reviews.Title: Gar review
Reviews.Author: garott
Reviews.Content: The cameras works well and I use it often when on travel to check my home.Astak Pan/Tilt Night Vision IP Network Camera (Black)

Reviews.Title: best mole ever
Reviews.Author: lynda
Reviews.Content: I realy like this mole is very easy to use i was in mx and on my ipad was looking at my room.i love the 180 it does i cant get sound yet still woring on that

Reviews.Title: Astak Mole Camera
Reviews.Author: YL42
Reviews.Content: This camera lets us watch live video of our house when we're traveling, plus it has two way audio. We can move it around with the iphone app and look at different places.It's very cool.

Reviews.Title: Great IP camera
Reviews.Author: Roosters
Reviews.Content: This is a great IP wireless camera.  Pictures are great, and you can view your camera from your Iphone or Ipad.  If you are looking for a great wireless camera within your bauget, THIS IS THE ONE!!!

Reviews.Title: Great device
Reviews.Author: ElGaucho
Reviews.Content: We got this camera to be able to monitor our pets when we are at work.  The device has been working exceptional for us and the support has be outstanding.  We love the night vision, the image clarity is fantastic, we usually "demo" the camera when friends come over our house and everybody is extremely surprise with the quality . We seriously recommend it to everybody

Reviews.Title: mole review
Reviews.Author: Eric "eric2035"
Reviews.Content: very useful.i used it mainly to keep an eye on my house.it scares people away bcos each time it records it makes noise.very clear image under low light or no light conditionsthere is a lag due to remote control and view but it depends on my wifi.i also use it to keep an eye on my sleeping baby.  better than other baby camera productsand i can view it at my laptop or smartphone.

Reviews.Title: CCTV Alternative
Reviews.Author: Lionel Tejada
Reviews.Content: Intially I was told about this camera by a friend when discussing a home security system.  I then initially bought 2 cameras but when figuring on strategic places to have them in the interior of my house I only needed one because whoever entered the house would have to pass the camera.  I like the idea of identifying different alert zones especially because we have an indoor cat.  I guess as time goes by the quality of the video and real time speed will improve.  I'm hoping in the future there will be a more instant way of notifying you of a breach and a better file system to save footage.  Overall I am very satisfied with the product.  Also hopefully in the future they will improve the design to make it less noticeble.  Good Product.Astak Pan/Tilt Night Vision IP Network Camera (Black)

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: ML
Reviews.Content: Interface to use in desktop and mobile device are user friendly! Very intuitive interface and no special training is needed. It's worth every penny!!!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: I have 2 cameras for over a year now.  Still working great.  One for the front door, and one for the back yard.  Very good product!

Reviews.Title: Nice web cam
Reviews.Author: Nona T. Barker
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up, worked out of the box. We  wanted to spy on our dogs with it.. No disappointment here.

Reviews.Title: Astak wireless camera is amazing
Reviews.Author: Randy L. Nornes
Reviews.Content: I bought the Astak wireless camera to monitor my vacation home.  In addition to keeping an eye on the home, it allows me to pan the camera to view the lake.  The camera was easy to set-up and use.  I highly recommend the Astak Mole wireless camera.Astak Wireless IP Network Camera, Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, 802.11b/g, Motion Detection, You can View it from your iPhone and Upload your video to YouTube Directly.

Reviews.Title: Good Value
Reviews.Author: ArtG
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera for my daughter and son-in-law to use as a monitor for my grandson's room.Setup was very easy and we were surprised at how good the image was in total darkness.  Everyone likes the idea that they can observe from anywhere just by logging onto a smart phone or iPad.They haven't moved it and don't use the pan and scan features so I can't comment on that but I'm considering getting another to use as a security camera for my home even though we already have a system.

Reviews.Title: So easy to set up
Reviews.Author: Pharmer
Reviews.Content: I had other webcams in the past.  The Mole is by far the easiest to setup and use.  Can access from both my ipod and android with no hassle.

Reviews.Title: Good buy.
Reviews.Author: Vincent Guida "Vinstigator"
Reviews.Content: The camera works well and when I did have a problem their online help walked me right through the fix. Very pleased.

Reviews.Title: Astak Mole Camera
Reviews.Author: kmuzi
Reviews.Content: I have had this camera at our summer cabin for the last 8 or 9 months.  It has worked extremely well and I use it on a daily basis when we are not at the cabin to check for weather damage and security.  I purchased a 2nd camera to monitor our other house.  It also works very well.

Reviews.Title: Mole fun
Reviews.Author: S
Reviews.Content: This is a great little tool that is easy to use and enjoy. Many ,many uses for this this baby!Think outside of the box!

Reviews.Title: MoleCamera from Astak
Reviews.Author: jaswu
Reviews.Content: Brought three from Costco on sale for $170. The most simple setup for a security camera system to use with iphone. You do need a fast internet connection (at least 8 mbps) in order to have good video connection. View from ipad is even better.

Reviews.Title: Bells & Whistles Included
Reviews.Author: DaddyO
Reviews.Content: This item included an SD card, functionality to pan and tilt, and had an iPhone app to access images immediately after setting it up. The ability to save images I believe is limited to PCs, but for the price, works extremely well. I would strongly recommend it to anyone looking for simple security - or to keep an eye on a pet while out for the day. Use your creativity - there are many other possibilities!

Reviews.Title: Love the Astak Mole
Reviews.Author: JimmyJ
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Mole a few months back and am using it to view the dogs playing at my Doggie Daycare, Dog Days of Birmingham -- [...].  I am able to monitor the dogs and the dog handlers who watch them while they are playing.  The Mole is great because I can pan and tilt and even see up there at night.  For the price it can't be beat.  I will be purchasing a couple more to monitor the front desk and the inside play area very soon.  Astak Wireless IP Network Camera, Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, 802.11b/g, Motion Detection, You can View it from your iPhone and Upload your video to YouTube Directly.  I see no reason to look at any others.

Reviews.Title: Astak IP camera
Reviews.Author: Marissa Tutunjian
Reviews.Content: I purchased this product several months ago so I have had ample time to put it through it's paces.  Works as advertised.  Easy setup and use.  I access from a remote pc, ipad and iphone seamlessly.  I like the clarity under all lighting conditions and the pan and tilt features.  Additionally its great not to have to have a subscription for the camera to be useful.  I have it at a second home so it provides great peace of mind.  Highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: I love my mole camera
Reviews.Author: Jen
Reviews.Content: I love my mole camera, installation was easy. We use it to check on our dogs when we are not at home. Have had the camera for 6 months now with no problems. I would highly reconmend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Mole Camera Review
Reviews.Author: Charles Byrnes
Reviews.Content: This is my first experience with an IP camera and I must say I have been very pleased.  The camera itself is of good quality, the software easy to install & setup, and the support team is very knowledgeable & accommodating.  I've moved this from location to location with no issues and the email notifications of movement within a target window within a frame - my primary reason for purchasing the camera  - works great.

Reviews.Title: works
Reviews.Author: Freightanimal
Reviews.Content: This camera works well. I have come to rely on it daily. The image is good day or night. I can always connect to it either on the network or from out on the internet. The best use has been from my smartphone as I always have it

Reviews.Title: Versatile little security camera
Reviews.Author: melvin
Reviews.Content: Love this multi purpose security camera.  It records, it moves on command to pan the room and its very discreet.  The camera can be viewed by remote computer or smart phone.  Knowing that everything is ok at home helps me relax on vacation.

Reviews.Title: Works !!!
Reviews.Author: Zzzip33
Reviews.Content: Camera works as advertised. Easy set up. Allows me to monitor the house while on vacation. A must have for people with teenagers in the home.

Reviews.Title: Astak Pan/Tilt Night Vision Network Camera Review
Reviews.Author: LAUREN VU
Reviews.Content: I love this camera.  It is easy to set up and features are great.  I also love the ability to control and monitor the camera remotely through Internet.  The wi-fi capability allows you to place the camera anywhere within your home.  The only thing I would want to see is lower price then I would get additional units.

Reviews.Title: Astek Mole camera review
Reviews.Author: Dara Ea
Reviews.Content: I have been using this camera for a couple of years now. There are only two negative reviews on it that I don't seem to like.1- Panning left, right, up or down should have a user's set limit. Right now, users must move cameras all the way left, right, up and down. If you can only see 180 degrees, you just have to live with no picture 180 degree.2-It's not universal available to views recorded videos.Other than that, the camera is very superb. It's even better yet if we can access it as we can access our own network via [...]  Astek free service is great for my use.

Reviews.Title: Astak camera
Reviews.Author: agentmark
Reviews.Content: I got my Astak camera at Costco for $330 or so, and it was one of the best investments I ever made!  I can watch and listen from my computer, laptop, iPhone, or Android phone!  There's no receiver so the installation is simple within minutes!

Reviews.Title: portable home security
Reviews.Author: DGDR
Reviews.Content: I want to know that I'll find my home the way I left it when away for a long weekend. I could bother a neighbor to do a daily walk through and try to contact me if something is amiss or be self-reliant with instant gratification by scanning the house on my smartphone through a mole camera. I've installed dozens of apps on the phone but really only use it to access weather radar and check this camera for evidence of fire or break in. It makes my time away worry free. It actually works in total darkness. I especially appreciate that there is no annual fee with the plan I've chosen.

Reviews.Title: Live chat quick
Reviews.Author: Serendipity "Serendipity"
Reviews.Content: When I changed my network modem I went to live chat and found out where to go to change the network.  Once I saw where to go it was very easy and worked great.

Reviews.Title: Good Security Cam
Reviews.Author: Russell E. Craber
Reviews.Content: I use this camera as security in a gym so I can monitor usage during non-staffed hours. It's great being able to log in, view what the camera sees, actually pan the camera remotely, and set certain hours for motion detection.  Great price, great product!

Reviews.Title: Mole camera
Reviews.Author: morefon
Reviews.Content: It's a great device. I use it to monitor (live) our vacation property so I know if there are any issues. I've never had a problem and do not anticipae any either...

Reviews.Title: The Mole
Reviews.Author: Larry N7LUF
Reviews.Content: One day I was in Costco and saw the Mole and had my smart phone that I just had got. I saw I could use my phone and connected to their Mole, so I did and as other watch on I connected, what fun it was, and just had to take one home. I now use it to watch my home main doorway and see what my 5 dogs are doing while I am gone.con: for indoor useAstak Pan/Tilt Night Vision IP Network Camera (Black)

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera with an awesome price
Reviews.Author: DM
Reviews.Content: This is a great IP camera with great features. Reliability and stability exceeds my $600 Toshiba IP camera.  Can be setup to email motion activated jpegs and infrared works well.

Reviews.Title: Far better than expected
Reviews.Author: CS
Reviews.Content: The Mole was easier to install and up and running than I expected. I would recommend this amazing little camera.

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT PRODUCT
Reviews.Author: SB_Mommie
Reviews.Content: We purchased the Mole after doing some extensive research on similar products and services. The Mole was in our price range and provides everything we are looking for in home security and protection. We couldn't be happier with the product and service and are extremely happy with this purchase. We strongly recommend this to anyone looking for this type of product.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Peter B
Reviews.Content: Very happy.  I use it all the time to see the great view from my home and check in to see when someone crosses the alarm line.

Reviews.Title: Best IP camera in the market.
Reviews.Author: Neo
Reviews.Content: I was looking for an IP camera that can be viewed via smart phone. I cannot believe how great this camera work. In my opinion Astak Mole is the BEST IP camera in the market for the price. I highly recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: A convenient and effective surveillance camera.
Reviews.Author: JonRed
Reviews.Content: What can I say? The MOLE camera delivers as promised. With a simple online account setup, I was able to begin viewing a live feed of the camera through Safari on my iPhone! A relatively straightforward solution than perhaps most of the competition.While it is no SLR-quality camera for sure, it gets the job done. The image quality is understandably low to keep an efficient data speed for a live stream - but a bit too low for my taste. Good thing video quality can be adjusted. As long as you can make out the figures in the pixelated, choppy video stream from your phone (or computer), the MOLE gets the job done.Of course, this necessitates the camera to be connected to the Internet. But aside from that, there is no additional equipment that needs to be set up. You are just presented with the versatile camera itself, complete with an integrated WiFi antenna.What the MOLE's greatest strength is its convenience. Online viewing is as simple as logging into Facebook. I just wish there were better software design, but it gets the job done. Camera quality is reasonably poor, as a live HD stream simply would take too long to load. Overall, if you just need a camera to quickly check up on home while away from home, or watch the baby (or the dog), or scout for thieves... the MOLE is a convenient solution both in price and in function.Did I mention that it looks a bit like HAL 9000? Awesome!

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: JR
Reviews.Content: I've had this product for about 2 years now and is still working perfectly!  Night vision is good quality my only thing is I wished that it had zoom capability as well... That is my only negative comment about this product.  I love being able to access my camera via internet and/or my iphone to see what's going on at home.  Very happy with the product!

Reviews.Title: Works like a dream
Reviews.Author: James Thom
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to add to my other two wireless camera's in my home. This product is much higher quality (especially at night) than either of my other two cameras in regards to the picture. I found it easy to set up and use it to monitor what my kids are doing in the playroom!.

Reviews.Title: Mole review
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: Very impressed with mole. Use it to check my dogs while at work. Sometimes the mole app doesn't connect quickly but still a great product.

Reviews.Title: Easy to Use Mole
Reviews.Author: Anthony D'Angelo
Reviews.Content: I have had this product about 1 year.  I had some connection challenges early on and was very impressed with the support resolving the issue.  The Mole continues to work and I enjoy the easy access online from my computer and iphone.

Reviews.Title: Mole Camera
Reviews.Author: RMAC
Reviews.Content: Purchased this camera to use in a babyroom.  Wife is able to use her iPhone and iPad as well as I keep an eye directly through my laptop.  Device works flawlessly via wired or wireless, which comes in handy when we move rooms.  Probably will purchase another one for security at the front of our house.  Thanks Astak for a great product!

Reviews.Title: Awesome company!
Reviews.Author: limnet
Reviews.Content: I purchased 3 Astak Moles, and love them!  They work perfectly, and keep my family safe.  Thanks for a great product!

Reviews.Title: Astak review
Reviews.Author: John E. Watts
Reviews.Content: The setup was easy and configuration with my computer and laptop with the wireless hook up gives me the veiws of the outside area of my residents 24/7 with movement capture of area that I have set up. Gives me a feeling that I have control of my area and can prevent unwanted intrusions.

Reviews.Title: it is ok. but quality are not good at all.
Reviews.Author: Kent Chui
Reviews.Content: I bought two. and one is already broken in less a year. the inside wires broken due to the camera head move around(it has move function). software is ok for those have computer experiences. for no computer experiences people may be hard to use the remote software. I try to teach my dad many times how to use them. the night vision light are too bright. viewer quality is ok. anyway, overall it is ok IT camera for use. hardware not really good. I gave one star for hardware.not recommended for buying.

Reviews.Title: JUNK - Don't waste your money especially if a Mac user.
Reviews.Author: Jacqueline Ovad
Reviews.Content: If you are a Mac user the instructions on getting the camera to display in Safari or Firefox don't work.  They refer to Preferences in Quicktime which was removed some versions ago and the Terminal hacks that they recommend also don't work.  Do yourself a favor and move on to another camera!

Reviews.Title: Security FLAW!  Anyone can view or control your camera.
Reviews.Author: Happy Jester "happyjester"
Reviews.Content: Im going to get to the point here.  This is a nice camera with good features, however there is a security concern... if using a direct link to your camera's web page, the logon/password is completely bypassed, and the camera feed can be viewed, or even controlled.You have read correctly.  this is something that I have tested multiple times from different browsers and even iphone.  All it takes is for someone to know your IP address, and that's it, they are in full control of your camera.I have communicated this to ASTAK twice and never got a response.  It's totally unacceptable.  ONE STAR for product, ONE STAR for support.

Reviews.Title: camera did not last
Reviews.Author: click
Reviews.Content: this camera did not last more than a year and a half, good luck getting tech support that's not happening . they ask you to leave a number and they never call back .once in a while you will reach a guy and he sounds like you just woke him out of bed . buyer beware of this camera.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera with Awkward Software
Reviews.Author: WilliWu
Reviews.Content: While the setup was difficult but not impossible, the software is far too quirky to rely on for any serious application. You are forced to go through yoics.com for all internet functions and that interface is so awkward and unreliable that it is all but unusable. It will not remember either my user ID or password on either my iPhone or my Win 7 desktop, so that I must enter both every time I turn the email and YouTube alarms on or off. It should be possible to do this by opening an ASTAK iPhone app and tapping a single arm or disarm icon. To make things worse, the login URL that works one day may not work the next. Also, the Record and Capture functions will not work unless you disable the Win 7 UAC security protection. I chose not to take this risk.  While the videos that are uploaded to YouTube work fine, those stored on the SD card in the camera will not play on any ordinary player. You have to download a special player that may or may not be compatible with your other software. I also chose not to take this risk. I've considered downloading the Yoics Camera Viewer iPhone app that is available on the Apple App Store, but the reviews on that software are so negative that I am still trying to work with the iPhone Safari browser interface. Finally, the camera's IP address that allows direct access through my home Wi-Fi changes from day to day so that it is not easy to arm/disarm the camera even within range of my own Wi-FI. I have thus far been unable to get any response when I attempt to contact ASTAK. While self-monitored security systems via smart phones is clearly the future of home security, this camera's software is not yet ready for prime time.UPDATE: After a few updates, the software is much more stable, but still awkward and limited as described in my original review.

Reviews.Title: Requires Internet Explorer
Reviews.Author: Clay Woman
Reviews.Content: In order to use all of the functions, this camera requires Internet Explorer. The box claims that you can VIEW with all browsers, which is true, but you can't control the camera or acquire video or still images with any browser except Internet Explorer.  That means that you can't use it at all with Macs. It is very frustrating to find this out only after you buy the camera, register, log on and contact the live chat for help.In addition, the resolution is very poor.

Reviews.Title: Horrible
Reviews.Author: Sean Clark
Reviews.Content: First review I've ever written.  Bought this to use over wifi....couldn't get it to work, and after hours gave in to call support.  What did they tell me??  My wifi router was not supported???  The wifi router is 802.11b/g compliant, as the camera is supposed to be.  I don't get it.  Could not get an answer to that question just kept getting a drone of 'not supported'.  Worked fine wired, but not what I spent the extra $$ for.  Suppose it would work fine with a supported router.  Good luck finding that list.

Reviews.Title: It simply will not work
Reviews.Author: peter Rabbit "PR"
Reviews.Content: I followed the directions. I spent days with tech support.I really wanted the camera to work and I was very motivated to catch something happening with the camera. But, this was very frustrating and the software would never work. I would conclude, since it will work for some people, that if it works straight away go with it and if not then bag it right away and save the wasted effort because it will not happen. I have used other software with other webcams very successfully several years ago. I am very computer capable. But I returned this camera and regret trying so hard to make it succeed.

Reviews.Title: Well engineered but very poor manufacturing quality ...
Reviews.Author: E. Parnagian "Ed P"
Reviews.Content: From the perspective of features and user interface, it was well thought out and easy to use.  The quality, however, was extremely poor.  After spending 8 hours trying to get the WiFi connection to work including 2 hours with their tech support I returned it.  I then purchased an identical unit from another source and found that it would not connect via WiFi either.  So obviously, there is no commitment to quality.  No testing of what they are shipping.  Either that or they are willing to sell units with inoperable WiFi in the hope that the person who buys it will only use the LAN connection. Very dissappointing!

Reviews.Title: Impossible to Set up, JUNK
Reviews.Author: Bernhard
Reviews.Content: I purchased this at walmart from the clearance section, $99, normally $159. I should have known better than to purchase from the clearance rack. Excitedly I pop the disk into my laptop, a window comes up without a title bar and no x buttons or anything. I click register camera, and everything seems to be going as expected, until it said unable to register, try again? I click yes, "Sorry already registered, go to support", click on support link - 404 error, page not found. Finally figured out how to log into account, camera offline(even though it's on). Removed from account to try again, sorry, already registered (this is a pop up behind the main window which cannot be closed - had to restart). Also saw I was signed up for a 1 month trial (nothing about this on the box), and found out to extend this would be 24.95/annually, apparently the camera is very limited in functionality without this. Packed it back up and will be returning it tomorrow.

Reviews.Title: Big security risk!!! Wach out.
Reviews.Author: J. Johnson
Reviews.Content: This camera has a major, major security bug. All version of the MOLE. Any user, anywhere, can view the camera and control functions of it, without having to enter a username and password. I have 5 MOLE's for my home security, all from different vendors. All 5 have this same security flaw. Even updating to the latest firmware did nothing. But at you own risk!

Reviews.Title: G
Reviews.Author: saul
Reviews.Content: Have bought  several $200-plus similar cams.... i have never being able to  configure the  portf-orwarding thing and technical support was very difficult to follow their insntruycton  the few times i was able to get through.. i got ther 1st one form walmart in case i had to return these type of cams  for not being able to view from outside my home ... this astak came was so easy to set up and right away i was able to see my home from my cell ..  i have being very happy with  it  i have since then  purchased  2 more  astak cams. .

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Joey Castaneda
Reviews.Content: We have purchased 4 of these cameras making this order our fifth. Perfect for keeping an eye on our business and making sure we are always in touch and know whats going on.

Reviews.Title: Astak Mole
Reviews.Author: Ike
Reviews.Content: Camera did not work properly.  SD card will not record.  Have 3 other Astak Mole cameras same as this one and am familiar with setting these cameras up.  Went online per Astak instructions and the same as in the past for technical assistance but no one will ever respond.  Have tried on numerous occasions for technical assistance with this new Astak Mole Camera to no avail.  Will not buy anymore --- do not need expensive paper weight.

Reviews.Title: easy setup, use BUT very limited visual angle
Reviews.Author: Chris D
Reviews.Content: The Mole cam is a decent IP camera which offers an easy setup as we all love it, good recording functionality BUT the visual angle of the camera is very limited - I wished they would put a wide angle lens on that thing.  Also the motion detection isn't working as reliable as I hoped.  Overall - I wouldn't buy it again.FYI: there's a promotion currently until Aug 31 from Astak: the code MSPECIAL will drop the price $30

Reviews.Title: Peace of mind while you are away.
Reviews.Author: ackifr
Reviews.Content: Was given this as a Christmas gift prior to leaving for FL.  Set it up in center of room with a 360 view of most of the house and a large thermometer so that I could also monitor temperature in house.  Product support line was great at solving a small connection issue while setting it up.  Depending on the distance from wireless router movement can be a little spotty but all in all this is a great product that I use at more than one location.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Delores
Reviews.Content: Good camera.  I like how easy it is to set up.  What does need work is the app associated with it, but hey, at least it has an app.  All in all, for a plug and play camera, it is pretty good.

Reviews.Title: You won't find a customer service/technical support as bad as at Astac
Reviews.Author: R.K.
Reviews.Content: Have this camera for over a year. It does not function properly. Do not hold your breath if you need an assistance... you will NEVER get any technical issue solved by the company's technical "support"! Everyone at the customer service sounds like they have not been educated about the product at all, forget about assisting with the problem. And it is virtually impossible to get someone on the phone.  The outgoing message on their machine asks you to leave your information promising to get back to you. They won't... ever.

Reviews.Title: Happy I bought it!
Reviews.Author: Kat
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a nanny cam for my home and I love it! With the night vision and audio, I can see and hear what is going on when I'm not there and o love that they have an app I can connect to on my phone.  Only downside is the phone app can be a little slow to load sometimes...

Reviews.Title: Easy, Mobile, Stand alone, Camera
Reviews.Author: sozucom
Reviews.Content: The Aztak Camera is easy to setup anywhere there is a power outlet and is easy to pan remotely.  While I wish the Yoics iphone App would let you hear sound and could be set to keep your screen from timing out, it is a very convenient way to watch and control the Aztak Camera.  It is great that I can take this camera with me to someone else's house, add it to their network and watch our baby sleeping in whatever room we put her in.

Reviews.Title: DON"T WASTE your time or money
Reviews.Author: LumberKing
Reviews.Content: Was on the phone with support for several hours. There technical support does try to assist Good job Vince, but their hands are tied, with out dated technology. They need to gain access to your computer to visualize the problem. I even went so far to have NetGear support on line. Very complicated

Reviews.Title: nice capability, but chronic pan problem
Reviews.Author: engineer "George"
Reviews.Content: I own two of these, one purchased at Costco, the other at Fry's. After about 9 to 12 months, BOTH of them no longer will pan (move left and right). At first, the pan was sticky, it would seem to get stuck, then move a little, would pan if the camera were tilted high. Now they just don't pan at all. Contacted Astak customer service and they recommended that I reset to factory conditions, because that had helped some customers. I'm sure that's not going to fix my problem because it deteriorated over time, and I can hear the pan motor running through the audio link, but the camera does not move. The camera is in a remote location, 550 miles away from me, so I cannot reset to factory conditions or I will loose all connectivity until I can next visit the camera. I also updated the camera firmware to the latest on a prior visit, but that didn't fix the problem. Now the warranty period has passed, so I'm probably stuck with two broken cameras.There are actually some great qualities of this camera: the Image quality is good and color is accurate, so they must be using a UV filter. Motion detection is excellent: there are 4 different detection zones that can moved anywhere within the image and the thresholds of each of the 4 zones can be set independently. Another feature I used was to write images and video clips to an SD card that can be inserted into the camera. I used a large card and would copy it to a portable HDD every 1 or 2 months when I visited the location.Set-up was pretty easy. I used the Yoics capability at first because it was easy to set up. Later disabled Yoics and just used port forwarding in my router, set camera to have static IP address on my LAN, changed the camera's http port#, set up a dyndns.com account, and enabled update client capability in the router to track IP address changes. Have about 6 different devices at the site that are also set up in this manner (other cameras and energy monitor).Would have rated Astak Mole 5 stars if I didn't have two cameras fail. However, with my two cameras purchased from different sources and many months apart, it sure seems like a chronic problem with this camera, and not related to a quality issue in a single manufacturing lot.With what I know now, I'd definitely purchase a Foscam FI8608W instead. FI8608W has audio, SD card, tilt/pan, WiFi, but its motion detection has only one zone and is not as flexible as the Astak Mole. Have 3 other Foscam cameras at the same location and they are reliable so far. Watch out for Foscam clones, buy from reputable Amazon reseller or direct from Foscam.

Reviews.Title: unreliable product and bad support
Reviews.Author: Claw "Pagosa Joe"
Reviews.Content: Had this camera for some time and the support is terrible. The camera hangs and you can never connect to it which is not good if you rely on this camera while you are away for some time. There are no software updates to this product ever. I am returning this to Costco where I bought it and good thing I can as this was a very expensive junk. As much as I wanted to like this camera it not reliable.buying a foscam directly from Foscam as the only way you can get their support is to buy from them but they have a great price right now and will be half hat the mole cost.UPDATE: 6-14-2012. A year later and I still have the camera. The issues I had with hanging at times I sold by putting a timer on my camera to turn off/off once a day to reset and clear up any issues. Part of this maybe related to my internet connection if slow will cause this hang as I try to move the camera to fast. The thing that works so well in my case is that Centurylink changes my modem IP all the time. With the mole I do not have to worry about that as the mole connects to a site and I log into that ( free). I have a foscam which requires me to connect to camera with IP with modem which changes all the time so foscam is worthless. Also this mole does a very good job out my windows and adjusting for glare and motion detection in my yard thru the glass is excellent. So I am changing my original review with this update.

Reviews.Title: Not bad... so far
Reviews.Author: John Brayton
Reviews.Content: I've only used this camera now for a few days, so I can't say much for its durability and whether it will last long enough to get your money's worth from it.The setup was fairly straight forward.  I am familiar with IP cameras and how to configure them on my network, so I didn't used their website to register and configure the camera.  It took me longer than it should have to configure the camera due to some quirky firmware issues that would modify settings after I had saved them.  For instance, I configured the camera to have a static IP and spent 15 minutes or more not being able to connect to the camera wirelessly. I finally discovered that some how my settings had been changed to have the IP assigned dynamically.  So just verify all your settings if you're having issues configuring the camera even if you are sure that you have configured and applied the settings earlier.Overall, the camera does seem to work pretty well and has some nice features.  What amazes me is how long it takes for products like this to hit the market.  I have been looking for IP cameras and have bought quite few of them starting in 2006, and they all seem to have issues primarily with the firmware and features that don't work or have quirky behavior.  It is a bit frustrating that a manufacture has not figured out this rather simple technology and can not deliver a real quality and rock solid product.  Maybe I'm in the wrong price range to find a nice IP camera with rock solid features.  It seems to me that most of these types of products are developed overseas by companies that just don't have the workforce or processes in place to design and implement a solid product.This camera has the most features of all the IP cameras I have purchased to date, and so far, appears to have implemented most of the features.  A few things mentioned in the specs like Twitter do not seem to have been implemented in the current version.  Support for multiple browsers is not there either.  But as long as firmware updates are a possibility and the camera is new enough to be supported, these issues should eventually be addressed.For now, I'm pretty happy with the camera given the price and implemented features.  Eventually, some one will get it just right for a price that we can all afford, but it's been 5 years now and counting, and I still looking...

Reviews.Title: Was great camera
Reviews.Author: Broker B
Reviews.Content: Worked great fro a couple months.  Had to reset routers ... hooked it back up..it woudl not detect it...And when you typically plug it in it would go through its full range of pan and tilt...Well it no longer moves. Called Support, the guy said hold the reset button down...well we did this for about 2-3 minutes..nothing happened. He then said "you must of got it wet". What in the hell made him say that? I don't take showers with it ..it sits on the corner of a shelf watching the dogs. I did nto bother telling him it never got wet because whats the point..he was like a lump on a logSo..I am off to Costco to return.Worked great for awhile...loved how customer service blurts out.."you got it wet"

Reviews.Title: Low Tech, High Price
Reviews.Author: Peyton Bass
Reviews.Content: Purchased from Costco (Thankfully, as they have a great return policy) and found the item worked for about 5 minutes (using either the Cat-5 cable or Wi-Fi).  You must go through a third-party vendor called Yoics (which gives you "full-access" for 30 days, after which they want you to upgrade to $25.00 a year) in order to view the cam on-line, or if you are in your home/business you can simply input the devices IP address and view as well.  Please note that this device does NOT support 802.11N, only B/G (really, in 2012 it only provides B or G?)A couple of things I tried to resolve the issue where power cycle the Mole, power cycle my Linksys route, clear router of all info. pertaining to the Mole, uses both a Toshiba and Mac to try and get this bugger going, but never was able to do so after the first attempt of 5 minutes.  I even created a new account at Yoics just in case that was the issue.  I then tried to contact Astak and after being on hold for about 5 minutes was told that nobody was available to assist me at that time and to try again later.  I then sent an e-mail to the only e-mail address I could find for Yoics but that bounced back as well.  This morning I tried heading over to the MoleCamera website and using their on-line support but found that was not going to work either.  Here is the response from their on-line support system: There are no operators available at the moment. If you would like to leave a message, please type it in the input field below and click "Send" button.Let the buyer beware.  You may have a better experience than me and others have had, but I would investigate other avenues of video monitoring before purchasing this device.

Reviews.Title: Wish I had read more reviews
Reviews.Author: Ronnie E. Gillian
Reviews.Content: I purchased this item thinking that I could make almost anything work after 40 years in the IT business.  I was wrong!  The documentation is poor and the customer support was worse.  The camera was marginal at best when working over wired Ethernet.  The wireless setup was more difficult.  After a significant amount of time with their "chat" system their solution was that, since their software did not support a NETWORK NAME long enough to support my wireless network, I should just change the name of the network. Never mind that the other dozen devices that use that network would also have to be changed.  Better Solution - return the camera.  Next time I will read the reviews more closely.

Reviews.Title: Pretty decent camera
Reviews.Author: jwtxs
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera due to a recent separation lol... and needless to say, this camera works!  The first camera I received was a "bad seed" but Hot Deals 4 Less had me send back the bad one, and PROMPTLY replaced it with a good one.  I have had the camera for about a month, and have figured out most of the "bells and whistles" and love this cam... Many thanks Amazon, and MANY MANY thanks Hot Deals 4 Less.

Reviews.Title: Reliability
Reviews.Author: R. Levy
Reviews.Content: Cameras are not reliable. They do not always maintain their internet wireless connection and remote viewing is not always possible. Night Vision LEDs are visible to the naked eye and should not be.

Reviews.Title: Doesn't work at all
Reviews.Author: Disappointed
Reviews.Content: After reading many reviews, I brought this camera to use in China. To my surprise, the setup CD was unreadable. Then after I have redigstered at yoics.com, I couldn't find my camera! One review said Icould link to my camera directly at 192.168.0.111, but it didn't work for me. The "breeze setup" became a nightmare. I also realized that there is no iPhone apps to view the vidoe stream so I can't monitor my baby's movement real time. Now I can only throw this piece of junk away. Well, here it goes $200!  I have to buy another wireless baby monitor to meet my needs.

Reviews.Title: Great for Surveillance
Reviews.Author: raybcool
Reviews.Content: What is neat about this camera is that I use it on travel.  I can go camping and capture critters in my camp ground.It runs on 12 volts, so just a 12 volt gel cell battery power (or car power) will work.The SD card and internal DVR works pretty cool.Pull the SD card and view on your notebook computer (even has time/date stamp files, for both photo and video).

Reviews.Title: Huge Security Flaw
Reviews.Author: Danny D
Reviews.Content: As much as i love this camera, I cannot recommend it until they fix the alternate URL access to it. Apparently, the standard URL that most computer based security software use to access the Mole's video feed will be password protected when you enable the Astak to ask for a password. That URL is usually in the form (add IP to the camera first, since Amazon won't allow me to type in a full URL) "/livestream/0?action=play&media;=video_audio_data" - However, after changing the access password on the camera, I was still able to access the video feed from my iPhone's video cam app, even though I had not updated the password on that app... So I rebooted the Astak and that changed nothing. By doing some investigating, I found out that my iPhone's app uses a different URL to access the feed (it uses "/tmpfs/auto.jpg") which itself does not require a password. Now imagine the security implications... disgruntled ex-employee, ex-boyfriend, nosy guest staying at house, etc..Awaiting a fix for this.PS: This review is for the CM-IP700 Mole

Reviews.Title: Pluses and minuses of the Astak Mole Wifi
Reviews.Author: oreo123
Reviews.Content: I really like the image clarity offered by this unit both during the daytime and at night.  My wife and I use the Astak Mole camera with both of our iPhones and our iPad.  I use the camera to monitor my back door whenever our somewhat feral house cat comes home at the end of the day and activates our motion detector.  Lots of creatures come by the back door (raccoons, skunks, chipmunks, squirrels, bluejays, oppossums etc. etc.) and ring the motion detector alarm.  So knowing ahead of time who is at the door before running down from the second floor is very useful.Unfortunately, it costs alot of money to keep the camera activated constantly, so the unit is not very helpful for around the clock monitoring.  Hope that changes in the future.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera, Does Not Record as Promised!
Reviews.Author: L. Natividad
Reviews.Content: The camera was very easy to set up, if you are computer savvy.  If you are not, them it might be a challange.  What frustrates me is that I cannot get this camera to save video or take pictures.  I am running Vista and when I called text support, they told me to do all these useless things, and still cannot record.  If you want to use it on your Iphone, it is grand... but buyer beware, the software features lacks recording options.  I might return it.  Night vision works well.  I gave it two stars due to software issues.  For the hardware, it works well, but very noisy when the camera pans up and down, left and right.
